statements: UPDATE UserPermissions SET access_level = 2, facial_data = 'Yes' WHERE user_id = 12345;
UPDATE UserPermissions SET facial_data = 'No', access_level = 1 WHERE user_id = 54321;

UPDATE UserPermissions SET facial_data = 'xyz', access_level = 3 WHERE user_id = 2;
UPDATE UserPermissions SET permission_type = 'admin' WHERE user_id = 1
UPDATE FacialRecognitionData SET captured_at = '2022-10-15 09:00:00' WHERE facial_id = 100
UPDATE UserPermissions SET facial_data_access = TRUE WHERE user_id = 123;
UPDATE FacialRecognitionData SET captured_at = NOW(), facial_image = '\xABCDEF' WHERE user_id = 456;

UPDATE users SET role = 'admin' WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE facial_recognition_data SET image_path = '/images/profile.jpg', data = X'FFFFFFFF', created_at = '2022-01-01 12:00:00' WHERE data_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';

UPDATE roles SET description='Admin role with full access' WHERE role_id=1;

UPDATE roles SET role_name='new_role', description='Updated description' WHERE role_id=2;
